privacy-policy.title: Introduction
privacy-policy.description: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it. This Privacy Policy explains how our app 'Expense Tracker' handles your data and your personal information when you visit our website or use our app.

privacy-policy.title: 1. Data Storage
privacy-policy.description: All of your data — including expenses, receipts, images, and other related records — is stored securely on your device only. We do not collect, transmit, or store your data on our servers.

privacy-policy.title: 2. No Account or Login Required
privacy-policy.description: The App works fully offline. There is no login, registration, or account creation required to use it.

privacy-policy.title: 3. Data Processing
privacy-policy.description: All expense tracking, parsing, and categorization features are executed locally on your device. No information is sent to external servers or third parties.

privacy-policy.title: 4. Data Export
privacy-policy.description: If you choose to export your data, the files are generated on your device. Once exported, it is your responsibility to manage and share these files. The App does not control or monitor where your exported data is sent.

privacy-policy.title: 5. Feedback and Support
privacy-policy.description: If you send us feedback via email, your message will be handled by your own device’s email client. We do not automatically collect or track feedback or personal information.

privacy-policy.title: 6. Third-Party Services
privacy-policy.description: No data is shared with or accessed by third-parties at any time while using the app.

privacy-policy.title: 7. Security
privacy-policy.description: Because your data never leaves your device, its protection depends on the security of your device itself. We recommend using standard device security measures (such as a passcode or biometric lock) to safeguard your information.

privacy-policy.title: 8. Updates to this Policy
privacy-policy.description: This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time to reflect changes in the App or legal requirements. Updates will be posted on our official website. Continued use of the App after changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated policy.
